title: What is the interpretation of mirrors in a dream?

preview.html: In this article, we will learn about the interpretation of mirrors in a dream in different cases. Seeing a mirror in a dream is one of the confusing visions, and the viewer cannot easily know its symbols and whether it symbolizes good or bad, so in this article we will learn about the cases in which a mirror is in a dream and what is the agreement with it. Interpretations of these visions as we received them from the leading dream interpretation scholars, so follow this with us. Featured article.Interpretation of mirrors in a dream: Seeing a mirror for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself in the mirror and her face is happy and beautiful, then this dream is good news for her, as it indicates that her year will be full of kindness, blessings, and obedience to God. If the woman has not given birth before that, then this dream is good news for her that God Almighty will soon give her good offspring. This dream may also indicate that this woman is waiting for someone close to her to return from the trip and that it is good news about the approaching date of his return. When a married woman sees herself looking in the mirror, this vision shows the understanding and harmony that she enjoys in her relationship with her husband and shows the deep feelings that he feels Each towards the other. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s vision in a mirror: Seeing a pregnant woman in a mirror indicates the satisfaction of her wants and desires, and it also indicates the safety of her pregnancy and fetus, God willing. If she sees that she is carrying a male or female and stands with him in front of the mirror, this is good news that God will grant her what she wished for regarding the gender of the baby. To be the one who gave birth to him in her dream. Interpretation of a dream about broken mirrors: Seeing broken or broken mirrors is an unpleasant vision, because it indicates difficulties and problems that the dreamer faces. If a pregnant woman sees a broken mirror in her dream, she will face some problems for the rest of her pregnancy, but the matter will be simple, God willing. She will be able to overcome it, heal from it, and be pregnant. success. Well, if God wants to do that. And for a married woman who sees a broken mirror, her dream indicates that there will be some problems between her and her husband, but they will be able to overcome them. Seeing the wreckage of a mirror in a dream means that there will be rivalry between him and his relatives. And Sheikh Al-Nabulsi believes Seeing a broken mirror for a married man or woman indicates the death of the wife because he sees that the mirror in a dream symbolizes the wife and breaking it means the end of her life that God has written for her. It is also said in the interpretation of a broken mirror in a dream that it could be a sign of the severing of the womb or the emergence of problems. Between spouses, it leads to separation and can also mean the collapse of the engagement of the fiancés, or the severing of relationships and relationships between kisses. Seeing cleaning mirrors in a dream Cleaning mirrors in a dream means getting rid of the worries and problems that surround the dreamer. A dirty mirror symbolizes worries and problems, and a clean mirror shows happiness and pleasure. Whoever sees that he finishes cleaning the mirror in his dream, this dream symbolizes that this person committed sins and transgressions, but he repented to God and gave up on them, and walked on the path of guidance and replaced the sins he committed with good deeds. . And hope for the satisfaction of God Almighty,

title: Interpretation of seeing a stupid person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a person who has become stupid in a dream through the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing a mute person in a dream indicates weakness of character and lack of faith, as well as worries and problems, and may indicate avoiding sins and gossip. In this article, we will explain the interpretation of a dream about a person who was left silent in a dream. , the man, the unmarried young man, the unmarried woman, as well as the married or divorced woman of some imams such as the imam. So follow us on the Ruya website. What is the interpretation of seeing a dream about a person who is silent in a dream by Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing a person who is stupid and unable to speak in a dream indicates fear and anxiety about the future and the lack of freedom and restrictions that govern it, such as morals and customs. And seeing a man who is mute indicates On weak character and inability to make sound decisions. Dreaming of silence in a dream is evidence of ignorance and lack of knowledge, and in a dream a man can indicate the abundance of livelihood and the opportunity to obtain money. A silent vision indicates lack of religion, weak faith and character, and negligence in duties and rights. Towards others. You can also read an explanation: The interpretation of seeing someone falling on his face in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a dream of someone becoming a fool in a single woman’s dream? If a girl sees that she has become silent, this means that she is staying away from evil people and avoiding bad deeds and sins. If a girl sees that she is pregnant If a young child is mute, this indicates that her life’s affairs will be facilitated and that she will achieve what she wants. You can also read an explanation: Interpretation of seeing a person wearing a gold chain in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a dream about a person left silent in a dream about a married woman? If a married woman sees that she is silent This indicates repentance from sins and staying away from gossip and gossip, because it indicates the stability of her marital life. However, if she sees that her husband is a slanderer, this indicates that he bears heavy household burdens and responsibilities, and the girl can indicate marital problems and disputes. Seeing the husband Silently, it indicates happiness and stability in their married life, or, on the contrary, harshness and cruelty in dealing and the lack of feelings between them. You can also read an explanation: Interpretation of seeing a person who loves chasing me in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a dream about a person who has become a fool in a pregnant woman’s dream? The vision of a pregnant woman may Becoming dumb in her dream means that the problems of pregnancy are gone and the birth will be easy. If a pregnant woman sees that her child has become silent, this is a promising vision and indicates the birth of a normal, healthy and secretive child. What is the interpretation of seeing a dream about a person left silent in a dream about a divorced woman If a divorced woman sees that she has become silent, this indicates the disappearance of problems and problems and the stability of her psychological state. If a divorced woman sees that a person is deaf and dumb, this indicates that there is a bad person in her life who is causing her problems. What is the interpretation of sign language in a dream? Sign language or teaching speech indicates in The dream indicates good news and news that will change the course of the dreamer’s life for the better. Sign language in the dream indicates good behavior with people, good morals, and avoiding sins and transgressions.

title: Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband ignoring me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my ex ignoring me in a dream. Interpretation scholars give different meanings about the interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband ignoring me in a dream, according to the interpretations of scholars and translators and not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband ignoring me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my ex-husband ignoring me in a dream, it can It may be a sign that she is thinking about her ex-husband, and God knows the unseen. If the divorced woman sees her ex-husband ignoring her, this may lead to sadness and anxiety, and God knows the unseen. Perhaps it expresses some of the worries that prevail over the woman at this time, and God knows best. If the divorced woman sees that her ex-husband is ignoring her, this may lead to sadness. And God knows everything that is not seen. Interpretation of dreams for my ex-husband asking me for food in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for my ex-husband asking me for food in a dream. It may be a sign of repentance, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband begging her for food, then his ex-wife may regret leaving her, and God knows the unseen. When a dream skips a divorced man’s request for food from his ex-wife, this could be a sign of her husband’s deep remorse, and God knows all. What is not seen. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife asking to return in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my ex-wife asking to return in a dream, it could be a sign of his return to his ex-wife. If the dreamer sees his ex-wife asking to return while crying, this may lead to solving problems, and God is Great and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees that He refuses his ex-wife’s request to return in a dream, as this may lead to cruelty, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife who gave me gold in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my ex-wife who gave me gold in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing my ex-wife giving me gold in a dream could be a sign of understanding and harmony, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband giving me gold, it may lead to marriage or her returning to his ex-wife, God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband giving her a gold ring in a dream, this may be a sign of kindness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife wearing a ring in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my ex-wife wearing a golden ring in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing my ex-husband in a dream may be a sign that I am thinking and regretting divorcing her, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees her ex-wife in a dream, this may be evidence of her desire to return to her ex-wife, and God knows the unseen. If A divorced woman saw her ex-husband wearing a ring in a dream. This may be a sign of good news, God willing. Interpretation of dreams about a black inscription for a divorced woman in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a black inscription for a divorced woman in a dream could be a sign of kindness, God willing, as seeing a black inscription for a divorced woman may indicate Happiness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: Interpretation of dreams to hear the news of death in a dream

preview.html: This vision has many different interpretations, and the following is an explanation of the dream of hearing the news of Ibn Sirin’s death or death, and an explanation of the most prominent cases and interpretations that differ depending on the viewer as to whether he is a man or not. The unmarried, married or pregnant woman is detailed as follows: Interpretation of hearing the news of Ibn Sirin’s death The great translator Ibn Sirin believes that if a person hears in a dream the news of the death of a relative or family or sees him dying, the interpretation of that depends on whether the news of the death is followed by loud screams and screams. or not. Wailing was an indication of the emergence of some problems and crises, especially in economic matters. However, if there was no screaming and crying, it is a sign of overcoming adversity and difficulties, salvation, and the removal of worries and sorrows, as well as the solution of problems and the occurrence of relief, God willing. Interpretation of hearing the news of a girl’s deathIf the dreamer is an unmarried girl and she hears in Her dream is news of the death of a member of her family or someone she knows, then this means that the imminent marriage, if the news is not followed by crying or loud screaming, on the other hand. And if there are sounds of crying and wailing, then this is a sign of distress, anxiety, pain, and falling into adversity, temptations, and judgments, and God knows best. But if a girl sees If an unmarried woman dreams that she is dying or hears the news of her death, then this is a sign of a happy life and longevity, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of hearing the news of the death of a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream the death of someone known to her, then this is a sign of happy news and happy events in her days. Next: If she sees the death of her husband in her dream or hears the news of his death, this is an indication that she will be pregnant in the near future without seeing the coffin. It is a dream and does not entail the consequences of a married woman, and God knows best. But if she hears the news of the death of someone she hates, this is a sign of the disappearance of worries, conflicts, and problems, while the deceased was a friend or someone she loved, and this was a sign of problems, misery, heartache, and sorrows. Interpretation of hearing the news of the death of a pregnant woman is considered hearing. The news of death in a person’s dream is generally an indication of the occurrence of an event in the dreamer’s life that will have a positive or negative impact, and it may be a sign of hearing surprising news that may be pleasant or sad. And if the news of her husband’s death is good news for the birth of a male child, and God knows best. If you have If you have a question or dream that you want explained, please feel free to put your question in the comment box and we will respond to you as soon as possible. We also invite you to follow our pages on social networking sites, Facebook, Twitter, and others, to receive exclusive dream interpretations. We wish you sweet dreams, peaceful sleep, and be well.

If you have If you have a question or dream that you want explained, please feel free to put your question in the comment box and we will respond to you as soon as possible. We also invite you to follow our pages on social networking sites, Facebook, Twitter, and others, to receive exclusive dream interpretations. We wish you sweet dreams, peaceful sleep, and be well.

title: Interpretation of a kiss on the head in a dream by Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Seeing kissing the head in a dream is one of the things that we often search for its meaning, and in the interpretation of kissing the head in a dream, there are many different interpretations. The same vision applies to all people, and in the following article we try to clarify some different interpretations to explain the vision of kissing on the head in a dream. Interpretation of a kiss on the head in a dream Al-AsimiSeeing a kiss on the head in a man’s dream Interpretation of a kiss on the head in a man’s dream On the fulfillment of some long-awaited desires, it also shows the dreamer’s victory over many enemies and overcoming many difficult problems in his life. Seeing a man kissing the head of a beautiful woman in a dream is evidence of the fulfillment of desires and hearing good news for the dreamer. Seeing a man kissing the head of his son or a young boy Evidence of family cohesion in the family and love and affection between family members. Kissing the mother’s head in a dream is evidence of his fairness to her, and an indication of material and moral stability in the dreamer’s life. Kissing the head of a dead person in a man’s dream indicates the appearance of many benefits and money that the dreamer inherits from the dead. Seeing him kissing the head in a married woman’s dream Seeing a married woman kissing her mother’s head in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that brings a lot of goodness and indicates the satisfaction of desires and hearing good news. Seeing a married woman kissing her husband’s head in a dream is evidence of her intense love for him and her affection and kindness toward each other. Seeing her kissing the heads of her children in a dream is evidence of love, care, and affection. It also shows that a woman bears many responsibilities. Seeing absolute kissing of the head in a married woman’s dream is evidence of the strength of religiosity and the strong faith of the dreamer. Seeing her head kissed in an unmarried woman’s dream is that seeing a girl is not... A married woman kissing her mother’s head is evidence that she will get what she wants and hear happy news. Seeing an unmarried woman kissed on the head by a stranger is evidence of her marriage at the time of the dream. Seeing her kissing the head of her mother or father in a dream is evidence of the family bond between her family members and a demonstration of her strong respect for customs. And traditions. Seeing a kiss on the head in a divorced woman’s dream. Seeing a kiss on the head in a divorced woman’s dream is evidence of her great need for love and romance in her life. Dreaming about kissing the head of a divorced woman also means that her desires will be fulfilled and she will hear happy news. A divorced woman seeing a kiss on her cheek in a dream indicates death. Worries and problems, the death of sadness and hearing joyful news. Kiss Seeing someone kissing the head of a person with whom he has a dispute in reality is a sign of reconciliation in reality. For more dream interpretations, visit the Live Interpretation of Dreams application.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about a cow that wants to fall, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about a cow that wants to swing is one of the good interpretations according to what is stated in the dream interpretation books of major scholars, although many feel a state of panic and anxiety after this vision because of the bad and frightening signs that the dream carries. The dreamer’s social status, the color of the cow, the way the dreamer was beaten, and whether he was fat or without meat. Interpretation of a dream about a cow that wants to fall according to Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about a cow that wants to dance? Many dream scholars agreed that the look of a cow is often a sign of the beginning of a life A new dream full of successes and happy events, and if the blow was from behind, this indicates the presence of a good friend in the fortuneteller’s life who pushes him to enter the path of God and do good deeds. The interpretation of a dream about a cow that wants to be beaten can be a sign of many fears and many thoughts about things. An imaginary dream that the dreamer imagines and believes will happen, but in reality it is not true. Laughing cows in dreams may indicate good opportunities awaiting the dreamer in the future and he must take full advantage of them in order to achieve what he wants and achieve his hopes. If someone sees that a cow is hitting near him or near His family, the interpretation of the dream is the deterioration of this person’s health condition due to his chronic illness. Some also said that a cow attacking another person in a dream is dear to the fortuneteller, and its magic foretells that he will obtain a lot of money in the coming period, but he will waste it on things that have no value or benefit. And that it could cause him to face many problems. Some scholars see a bad interpretation for someone who sees in a dream a cow that wants to devour it, and he said that it is an undesirable sign of poverty, loss of trade, and loss of money. Interpretation of a dream about a cow that wants to fall, according to Ibn Sirin: Attacking a cow and hitting it is a worthy sign. With praise, it symbolizes happy situations and the arrival of happy news. As for a light-colored cow, if it falls from behind, it indicates positive changes that will affect the life of the fortuneteller. Seeing a cow is interpreted as destroying problems, getting rid of anxiety, shining in high positions, and interest in self-development. It is also It symbolizes a life full of joy, happiness, and love. The cow comes in a single man’s dream as a symbol of the girl he loves. To get the correct interpretation, do a search on Google, the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site. Interpretation of a dream about a cow that wants to swing for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees a cow hitting her and she has a beautiful face, give her good tidings. With her good condition, her marriage to a pious, religious young man is imminent, and severe beating leads to sincere repentance and an end to the sin. And committing sins and being directed to the path of righteousness. The dream, if it really concerns her, indicates the difficult period that she is currently going through and the many crises and difficulties that stand in the way of her dreams. In the event that the girl fell to the ground when the cow violently hit her, this is an undesirable sign that means failure And failure in some things that she has done recently. The dream also symbolizes the disintegration of the family or an unstable emotional life due to many quarrels.

title: Interpretation of seeing a visitor in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a guest in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, one of the characteristics of Arabs in general is that they pay a lot of attention to guests and try to appear before them in the best way and appearance, but a stranger sees guests in a dream. Some see these dreams as indicators that something is happening outside and will affect the person and his life. Special, whether negatively or positively, in this article today we will learn together about me, the interpretation of seeing a visitor in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of the dream of seeing a visitor in a dream Interpretation of Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a visitor in a dream is evidence of people’s travel or absence and that it contains many It is a sign of goodness, contentment, and bliss. Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees in his dream that he receives many guests in his house and is happy, with a smile on his face, then this is evidence that great and abundant goodness will come to him on the path and by God. Higher and I know. In the event that the dreamer is ill, the guests in his dream indicate that he will be cured in the near future by God’s command. Interpretation of the dream of seeing visiting relatives in a dream. Ibn Sirin confirmed that the interpretation of seeing relatives in a dream varies depending on the condition of the visitor upon arrival, for example: If the guests are relatives in the dreamer's dream, they are wearing the most beautiful clothes and a smile is on their faces, then the vision is a sign of an abundance of goodness, living and kindness that will come to the dreamer in the near future. The future is God's will. If the guests in the dreamer's dream wear dirty, intact or torn clothes, this is an indication that a lot of fatigue, misery, misery, and a lot of problems are on their way to the dreamer in the near future, God forbid. And God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing visiting relatives in a dream for a single woman. Ibn Sirin believes that a strange visitor in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is patient in the face of severe adversity, but God eases his distress and grants him happiness and healing as a reward for his patience by God’s command, and God Almighty. And he knows best. Ibn Sirin claims that seeing visitors in general in a dream for a girl who is not yet married or single is a sign of goodness, abundance, and abundance that will come to her in the near future by God’s command. But if a visitor comes in a dream to a girl who does not have a date, this is an indication that Decent and lawful living and coming to her on her way. But if her guests came in the dream of a girl who had not been married before and she entered the house and sat in it happily and brought her many gifts, then this is evidence of her marriage to a good man who fears and fears her. God loves him and God knows best. As for seeing guests in an unmarried woman’s dream eating in her house, this is evidence of her success in her academic life and studies, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing visitors in the house for a married woman: If a married woman sees herself in a dream, and happily receives guests in her house, then this An indication that her home contains a lot of love, happiness, care, and understanding for the family. If the number of guests in a married woman’s dream is large, this is evidence of the joys that prevail in the home and happy circumstances, by God’s will. But if the number of guests is

title: Seeing a righteous guardian in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a good guardian in a dream for a single girl: When a virgin girl sees herself kissing a cleric in a dream, it is a sign of the imminent marriage of a sincere, moral man who has a high status. As for her, she sees that a good man is asking her to marry. She will marry a man with high morals and loyalty to the religion, and she will be happy. By living with him, God willing. The vision of marrying a religious man is a sign of the money that you will earn in the coming period. It also indicates eating a lot of food, God willing. It is also considered a vision in front of a mosque, a cleric, or a righteous person. Signing the marriage to a committed man By the religion and Sunnah of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. If a virgin sees herself marrying a religious man, this is good news that a lot of money will come to her, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone reading the Qur’an in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a righteous guardian in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees a religious man In her dream, this is a sign that she will obtain goodness and blessings, God willing. When she sees a righteous man or an old man in a dream, this is evidence of the stability of marital life. When she sees her kissing the hand of a cleric, this is a sign that this woman is righteous, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that the priest A long beard is a sign that she will get money soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a righteous man in a dream about the man and its meaning. The dream may indicate that you are sitting with a lot. The worries and problems that exist will end in a short time, and God knows best. Read also: Seeing a righteous man in a dream By Ibn Sirin, the meaning of seeing a righteous guardian in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. When she sees a pregnant cleric in a dream and prays behind him in the mosque. Good news for her that her son will in the future obtain a high status among men, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a righteous guardian in a dream for young men and its meaningIf one sees himself in a dream kissing The hand of a religious man, then this is a sign that this person is not in danger and that he is protected, and God knows best. Giving milk to a righteous or religious man in a dream is a sign that this person does good and does good deeds. And God knows best. Seeing a righteous guardian in a dream - Ibn Sirin’s interpretation: If a person sees in a dream a righteous man alive after his death in a city. It indicates that this country will enjoy justice from its president and that God will grant them success and success. And God knows best. While Ibn Shaheen says if he sees wise and righteous stewards, it is a sign of loss of worry, and that God will rejoice at his arrival, God willing. This dream also indicates that the one who has the vision will attain goodness and blessing, and it also indicates safety. As for the interpretation of Al-Nabulsi’s vision of the righteous, he says that it is life. And the Sunnah of God’s beloved. And God knows best. As for whoever sees that he has turned into God’s righteous beloved, this is evidence of fear of his Sunnah and his group. It is also an indication of the occurrence of a calamity or an evil event according to the character of this righteous man. God is Most High and Most Knowing. You may be interested: Seeing a cleric in a dream for a single woman. Indicators Other: To see a religious scholar in a dream: A religious scholar in a dream can indicate the emergence of problems for the dreamer, because it can cause illness. I swear

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a connection in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about engagement: In a dream, engagement in reality means a connection between a young man and a girl, and this concept is known in all societies, but there are many young men who recognize girls by name. This vision has the meaning of interpretation and meaning that we will learn together in our article today. Interpretation of the appearance of a bond in a dream: The bond in general in a dream indicates a current relationship in the life of the dreamer, so if one sees in his dream that he is linked to his girlfriend again. His vision shows that there is a relationship strong between them and that their relationship will continue without problems or obstacles until the end that the vision desires. As for whoever sees in his dream that someone he loves is asking him to develop the relationship between them, his vision indicates that the relationship between them will move to the second stage. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is related to another person His vision shows that the dreamer went through a previous stage of attachment and it caused him a lot of suffering that is still affecting him with its positives and negatives. As for someone who sees in a dream the death of a person with whom he was in a relationship, his vision indicates his reluctance to enter into a new relationship, and this The vision also indicates to the girl the return of an old lover. . For her. As for the one who sees in his dream that the one he loves is asking him to develop the relationship between them, then his vision indicates that the relationship between them will move to the second stage. As for the one who sees in his dream that the one he was attached to died, then his vision shows the person’s love by seeing that person strong, but Awake he cannot express his love. He is attached to the person he loves, because his vision indicates that he suffers from neglect and lack of attention, and he must take more care of himself. Interpretation of a dream about marriage and engagement in one dream: A lonely girl who is looking into the details of her wedding or engagement A dream is evidence of this in abundance, and it could be the result of old age and the desire for stability, as subconscious thoughts play their role in this matter. But there are other indicators that marriage takes place in a dream, which is the person who was related to the girl in the dream, and if he knows that, this indicates his desire to marry. Communicate with him in reality but this is not so. Suitable and not a dream about a knight. An unmarried girl’s refusal to speak in a dream is evidence of happy events within her home and may be linked to her marriage to a suitable person. Interpretation of a dream about marriage and participation in a married woman’s dream: Seeing a married woman engaged or married in a dream to a stranger is a sign of good judgment. And the abundance that she and her husband will enjoy soon, and it may indicate a long life and blessed health. And if she sees strange and sexual intercourse without her husband, this is due to her husband in successful cooperation with a group of men who have the same characteristics of sight, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about marriage and participation in a dream Pregnant woman: During pregnancy, a pregnant woman suffers from psychological disorders and health disorders that are directly reflected in her dreams, as in her dream she sees marriage again, or some people offer her an engagement and interpret it as good, vital, and a lot of money. .A person's marriage is a guide to facilitate surrender and surrender

Interpretation of a dream of marriage and engagement in a married woman's dream: Seeing a married woman engaged or married in a dream to a stranger is a sign of good judgment and abundance that she and her husband will enjoy soon, and may indicate a long life and blessed health. And if she sees strange and sexual intercourse without her husband, this is due to her husband in successful cooperation with a group of men with the same characteristics of vision, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of marriage and engagement in a pregnant woman's dream: A pregnant woman suffers during pregnancy from psychological and health disorders that are directly reflected in her dreams, as she sees in her dream marriage again, or some people offer her an engagement and interpret it as good, vitality and a lot of money. . A person's marriage is evidence of facilitating surrender and surrender
